title: WTT: Hindu Cy Young portrait for 1951 Bowman Mantle
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: WTT: Hindu Cy Young portrait for 1951 Bowman Mantle
posts.post_content:
Doesn't have to be a straight 1-for-1. Please let me know if you are interested. Thanks.

Edited to add: I won't turn down a 52 Topps either :)
Hoping to trade for a 51 Bowman Mantle (52 Topps if someone is feeling generous). If a cash offer blows me away I will consider it. Thanks.
